title: So, these crashes
body: Are getting really out of hand now. I'm sitting on my 3rd bugsplat crash this week as of typing this because something on Riot's end isn't agreeing with me >:C My team is going to be down a support now because I can't connect at all without it insta-crashing and taking me to said bugsplat and now I'll be copping another leaver due to this. Is there going to be a fix for this thing at some point?
